starter.name: Starter
starter.description: For companies that need design support. One request at a time.

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: 2x faster. Ideal for a MVP, a Web App or complex problems.

services.que: What services does Nexus Partners offer?
services.ans: We offer a full range of digital services: website creation (showcase, e-commerce), custom application development, local SEO optimization, and WhatsApp automation solutions.

duration.que: How long does a typical project take?
duration.ans: The duration depends on complexity. A showcase site typically takes 2 to 3 weeks, while a more complex business application can take 6 to 10 weeks.

pricing.ans: We work either on a fixed price for well-defined projects or on a subscription basis for continuous support (Design & Tech as a service).

support.que: Do you offer support after delivery?
support.ans: Yes, we provide post-launch support for a minimum of 30 days and offer maintenance packages to ensure the security and performance of your tools.

Solutions.description: Looking to boost your visibility and sales? At Nexus Partners, we create websites, local SEO, and WhatsApp automations that attract real customers and grow your business in Benin and West Africa.

Hero.title: About Nexus Partners
Hero.subtitle: Connecting technology to the real growth of local businesses.
Hero.description: Nexus Partners is a tech startup based in Cotonou, specializing in creating simple and effective digital solutions for artisans, traders and SMEs in West Africa.

History.title: How Nexus Partners was born
History.constat: Nexus Partners was born from a simple observation: many local businesses use digital without a clear strategy and lose customers every day.
History.mission_context: Our mission is to transform this digital presence into concrete results: visibility, customers and sales.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: Help local businesses attract more customers and automate their growth through accessible digital solutions.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: Become the West African reference in simple, local and results-oriented digital solutions for VSEs/SMEs.

Founder.name: Isma√´l Christian DAOUDA ABASSI
Founder.bio: Passionate about technology and SME growth, Isma√´l founded Nexus Partners to connect digital innovation and African field reality.

Team.title: Our Team
Team.description: A dynamic small team based in Cotonou, united by the passion to make digital accessible and profitable for everyone.

WhyUs.title: Why Nexus?
WhyUs.subtitle: A sustainable growth partner
WhyUs.description: We don't just build websites. We build the digital foundations for your future success.

reasons.title: Local market understanding
reasons.text: We know the real challenges of West African businesses. Our approach is not just technical, it's cultural and contextual.

reasons.title: Solutions for SME budgets
reasons.text: Premium digital must be accessible to those who create the local economy. We optimize every investment for maximum ROI.

reasons.title: Human accompaniment
reasons.text: We don't just deliver code. We train your teams and accompany you in the digital transition from A to Z.

reasons.title: Fast visible results
reasons.text: Every digital action is measured. We track the direct impact on your sales and visibility to adjust the strategy in real-time.

Hero.title: Ready to transform your future? Let's talk.
Hero.subtitle: Our experts are ready to discuss your strategic and digital projects.
